messages.title: Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit
messages.content: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring a real Brexit outcome where the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensuring a real Brexit outcome where the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

images.caption: Image of Mark Griffin standing with text stating 'Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit. Vote for the Brexit Party on December 12th.'
Image of a 'Contract with the People' highlighting pledges by The Brexit Party.

leaflet.additionalNotes: A call to action to not waste votes and to support the Brexit Party to beat Corbyn's Labour.
